overview:
Patrick C. Price is a Swiss Internet entrepreneur. He started his online career in 1995 and took on responsibility as Head of Business Development and Chief Marketing Officer of the Swiss Scout24 classifeds group from 2000 to 2007.

In 2008 he founded Idealizer AG, a Swiss eLab for online media, which runs a variety of citizen engagement-plattforms in Switzerland and Austria (vergleiche.ch/.at, blog.ch/.at, blognews.ch, blogverzeichnis.com).
